@ MrStarz

This movie was not recorded at 1920x1080. If you check the technical specs at IMDB you will find that this movie was recorded at 1920x800. So this copy of this movie is 1080p meaning he ripped at full HD. Please do your research before stating incorrect information.. especially when some like YIFY is providing free movies. Thanks YIFY!
